text: TalkTV was a British television channel owned and operated by News UK. It was opened on 25 April 2022 and closed on broadcast television in April 2024. The channel featureed video simulcasts of TalkRadio programming during off-peak hours, but launched with four original programmes, Sky News Australia, The News Desk, Piers Morgan Uncensored, and The Talk. Category:2022 establishments in Europe Category:2020s establishments in the United Kingdom Category:British television channels
title: TalkTV (British TV channel)
